pksav_gen4_import_text
enum pksav_error pksav_gen4_import_text(const uint16_t *p_input_buffer, char *p_output_text, size_t num_chars)
Convert a string from the given generation's format to a multi-byte C string.

enum pksav_error pksav_gen4_export_text(const char *p_input_text, uint16_t *p_output_buffer, size_t num_chars)
